vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.13;
son of: Reuel (H7467);
brother of: Nahath (H5184), Zerah (H2226) and Shammah (H8048)
§ Mizzah = "fear"
son of Reuel and grandson of Esau
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Reuel, hijo de Esaú
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米撒 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "害怕"
流珥的兒子, 以掃的孫子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
米撒 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "害怕"
流珥的儿子, 以扫的孙子
